Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Oakley
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via Western (terminal), 118th, Bell, and 119th due to, street blockage near 119th/Oakley,

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western (terminal), 118th, Bell, and 119th due to street blockage near 119th/Oakley,

Allow extra travel time.
